Vector Clock - Requirement 1: Four Distinct Comparison Results compareVectorClocks should return "equal" when clocks are identical
Vector Clock - Requirement 1: Four Distinct Comparison Results compareVectorClocks should return "equal" for empty clocks
Vector Clock - Requirement 1: Four Distinct Comparison Results compareVectorClocks should return "before" when clock A causally precedes B
Vector Clock - Requirement 1: Four Distinct Comparison Results compareVectorClocks should return "before" when A is subset of B
Vector Clock - Requirement 1: Four Distinct Comparison Results compareVectorClocks should return "after" when clock A causally follows B
Vector Clock - Requirement 1: Four Distinct Comparison Results compareVectorClocks should return "after" when B is subset of A
Vector Clock - Requirement 1: Four Distinct Comparison Results compareVectorClocks should return "concurrent" when neither clock dominates
Vector Clock - Requirement 1: Four Distinct Comparison Results compareVectorClocks should return "concurrent" for disjoint clocks
Vector Clock - Requirement 1: Four Distinct Comparison Results compareVectorClocks should return exactly one of four values
Vector Clock - Requirement 1: Four Distinct Comparison Results compareVectorClocks should distinguish "equal" from "concurrent"
Vector Clock - Requirement 1: Four Distinct Comparison Results Helper functions isBefore should return true only for "before" comparison
Vector Clock - Requirement 1: Four Distinct Comparison Results Helper functions isAfter should return true only for "after" comparison
Vector Clock - Requirement 1: Four Distinct Comparison Results Helper functions isConcurrent should return true only for "concurrent" comparison
Vector Clock - Requirement 1: Four Distinct Comparison Results Helper functions isEqual should return true only for "equal" comparison
